products.title: Amazon Basics Microfiber Cleaning Cloths, Non-Abrasive, Reusable and Washable - Pack of 24, 12 x16-Inch, Blue, White and Yellow
products.short_description: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime shipping.
products.long_description: Ultra soft, non-abrasive microfiber cleaning cloths will not scratch paints, vinyl, glass, finishes or other surfaces Effectively cleans either dry or with liquid cleaners for streak-free and lint-free results Absorbent cleaning cloths soak up eight times their own weight Pack comes with three different towel colors (blue, yellow, and white) Rinse and reuse the durable, washable cleaning cloths 100's of times Imported; 90% Polyester/10% Polyamide construction Each cloth measures approximately 12 x 16 inches

Evaly has come up with almost all types of collections considering the buyers. So that they can find the product of their choice and buy the product of their choice.

review.message: I’ve used a lot of microfiber towels for rags and most of them aren’t absorbent. I need to be able to use rags for all job not just dusting. These do the trick! They are great for dust and they absorb all the messes my kids make. And for the price!!! I definitely recommend!
Not as big as the last lot and the labels are massive and unnecessary
